Articles.Content:
Hello,

I think I have found a bug where there are two ships when in IVA view. I was flying a plane around the KSC and I paused the game while in IVA mode. Then I pressed F2 to get rid of the UI and I saw my own ship, while I was in it. It seems like pressing F2 changes the cameras position somehow. The bug only seems to appear while you are turning very fast.

Images: https://imgur.com/a/HAbE1cE
